channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Mateus Balotin
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Mateus Balotin

item.title: Project 2: Craigslist Vehicles Prediction
item.description: Created a tool that predict the price of a vehicle from Craigslist based on some features. Used a dataset from kaggle with more than 400k entries. After data exploration and data analysis, cleaned the data and did some Feature Engineering. Used RandomForest, XGBoost and Linear Regression to reach the best model. Link to Github Repository

item.title: Project 1: Reinforcement Learning: Cartpole
item.description: A project to understand the basics of DQN - Deep Q-Networks. Applied concepts of Q-Learning and Neural Networks. Based on: https://github.com/ageron/handson-ml2/blob/master/18_reinforcement_learning.ipynb Link to Github Repository

item.title: About
item.description: Data Science and Machine Learning are my passion. Since I was a kid I was fascinated by the idea of computers and when I learned about machines learning by themselves and Data Science I got even more enchanced. I’ve been studying data science since 2020 and I’m currently finishing my bachelor’s degree in Mathematics on UFPR.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can find me on these social media platforms for a chat! Platform URL Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/mateus-balotin-28869b1b0/ Github: https://github.com/MateusBalotin
